short_summary: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec
full_summary:
**EF236-241877 Water Infiltration Repairs and Envelope Interventions - Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines**
==========================================================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of PSPC, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for specialized public building construction services related to water infiltration repairs and envelope interventions in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec, Canada.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* **Publication Date**: April 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 27, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: May 22, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 14, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 30, 2025

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* **Contract Type**: Competitive procurement
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Delivery**: Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec

**International Trade Agreements**
--------------------------------

This procurement is subject to Canada's international trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact:

Moses, Anton (SPAC/PSPC)
anton.moses@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Document Access**
------------------

The RFP documentation is available for download at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19297839?extsite=MTkyOTc4MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that I removed redundant information, removed the glossary description of Contracting Entity and glossary descriptions for trade agreements, regions of opportunity, and provinces to make the content more concise. I also rephrased some sentences for clarity. The original content was not comprehendible.
